trans-unit.source: "Watch yourself," warned Starke. "These plants aren't nice when they're hungry."
trans-unit.target: 「你小心点，」史塔克警告道，「这些植物一饿起来可不是好玩的。」

trans-unit.source: Each flower identical, every leaf and petal disturbingly exact.

trans-unit.source: Acidic Sliver
trans-unit.target: 酸液裂片妖

trans-unit.source: Each Sliver gains "o2, Sacrifice this creature: This creature deals 2 damage to target creature or player."
trans-unit.target: 每一个裂片妖获得「o2，牺牲此生物：此生物对目标生物或玩家造成2点伤害。」

trans-unit.source: The first sliver burst against the cave wall, and others piled in behind to deepen the new tunnel.
trans-unit.target: 第一个裂片妖炸毁于洞壁上，其余的也跟进，以掘深此新的通道。

trans-unit.source: Crystalline Sliver
trans-unit.target: 水晶裂片妖

trans-unit.resname: STH·127 | Crystalline Sliver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Slivers cannot be the target of spells or abilities.
trans-unit.target: 裂片妖不能成为咒语或异能的目标。

trans-unit.source: Bred as living shields, these slivers have proven unruly—they know they cannot be caught.
trans-unit.target: 生而为活动的盾，这些裂片妖确实难以驾驭～牠们知道自己没人逮得住。

trans-unit.source: Hibernation Sliver
trans-unit.target: 冬眠裂片妖

trans-unit.source: Each Sliver gains "Pay 2 life: Return this creature to owner's hand."
trans-unit.target: 每一个裂片妖获得「支付2点生命：将此生物收回拥有者手上。」

trans-unit.source: Mogglings have been known to play ball with hibernating slivers, completely unaware of their true nature.
trans-unit.target: 据知小莫葛们曾把冬眠中的裂片妖当球来玩，浑然不知其本性为何。

trans-unit.source: Sliver Queen
trans-unit.target: 裂片妖后

trans-unit.target: 将CARDNAME视为裂片妖。 o2：放置一个裂片妖衍生物进场。将此衍生物视为1/1的无色生物。

trans-unit.source: Her children are ever part of her.
trans-unit.target: 她的孩子永远是她的一部份。

trans-unit.source: Spined Sliver
trans-unit.target: 刺棘裂片妖

trans-unit.target: 若任何裂片妖被阻挡，对每个阻挡它的生物，该裂片妖得到+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Slivers are evil and slivers are sly; And if you get eaten, then no one will cry."\n—Mogg children's rhyme
trans-unit.target: 「裂片妖坏，裂片妖烂； 要被吃掉，是你活该。」 ～莫葛童谣

trans-unit.source: Victual Sliver

trans-unit.target: 每一个裂片妖获得「o2，牺牲此生物：获得4点生命。」

trans-unit.source: "We are kinfolk," explained Karn to the sliver queen. "Just as you need your progeny to complete you, so do I need the pieces of the Legacy to make me whole."
trans-unit.target: 「我们是同类，」卡恩向裂片妖后解释道。「正如妳需要自己的子嗣来补全妳，我也需要远古遗产来完成自己。」

trans-unit.source: Bullwhip

trans-unit.source: "Pain is a crude way to enforce obedience, but it is cheap and plentiful."\n—Volrath
trans-unit.target: 「要使人服从，痛苦是最野蛮的方法，却也是最便宜的方法。」 ～瓦拉司

trans-unit.source: "I expected a fight, but I didn't expect it from the building itself."\n—Gerrard
trans-unit.target: 「我已准备一战，却完全没想过对手会是建筑物本身。」 ～杰拉尔德

trans-unit.source: "Finding a true heartstone is even harder than finding a true heart."\n—Hanna
trans-unit.target: 「寻求真正的心石比寻求真心还要困难。」 ～哈娜
